BodyName: Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing

Items.Title: A Local Law, in relation to a study on single-use plastics
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the use of reusable beverage containers provided by customers at food service establishments
Items.MatterName: Use of reusable beverage containers provided by customers at food service establishments.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that balloons made with electrically conductive material and filled with gas lighter than air be weighted and include warning labels
Items.MatterName: Requiring that balloons made with electrically conductive material and filled with gas lighter than air be weighted and include warning labels.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to restricting eating utensils and extra eating containers, and clarifying the definition of third-party courier service
Items.MatterName: Restricting eating utensils and extra eating containers, and clarifying the definition of third-party courier service.
